name: 3D Geometry Dash
description:
Use A and D or the arrow keys to move. Avoid the obstacles. Can use touchscreen. Can jump on yellow tiles.

Nightmare mode turns the camera upside down and reverses the A and D movement. One of the arrow keys and either A or D must be pressed together for movement. Advised to play in two player mode. Nightmare mode does not work on mobile.

Use M to return to the main menu and F to change perspective. Post your scores below!

Browser version may take a few minutes to load.

Credits to Brackeys for game idea.
